Local News Bothell police officer shot and killed after chase; suspect in custody A Bothell police officer was shot and killed Monday night, following a chase that began when officers attempted to pull over a black sedan on SR 522.

Dave Ross Potential coronavirus mutations impacting infection rate and vaccines Coronavirus mutations may play a major role in infection rates and potential vaccines. How will that impact us? Mercer Island MD Dr. Gordon Cohen joined Seattle's Morning News to discuss.
